title: Burning Tides: The Reckoning Epilogue

embed.description: Twisted Fate and Graves have been captured and the teeming port teeters on the brink. Read the bloody conclusion of Bilgewater: Burning Tides.

body:
Bilgewater is ablaze. Gangs are turning on each other while fire scorches the streets. Amid the chaos, someone moves with newfound purpose.

You can find out more [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-update/gangplank-sails-pbe).

replies.body:
Not sure if this can be answered, but is Gangplank aware of who tried to do him in? Seems like that's the case, especially since there's no doubt he has several enemies that wants him dead.

> For fifteen years, she had scraped together everything she needed; waiting until she wasn’t even a memory to him, for him to drop his guard and get comfortable in the life he’d built.
In the immediate aftermath, no. But as MF is hunting down anyone who sailed under his banner, it won't take long for him to find out.
What if we only played gp in aram, do we still get the skin?
If you owned him, and played him since the first rework at the start of the event, then yes you will. ARAM counts.
Do you have any idea if Bot games (Coop Vs AI) count?  I'm never quite sure if they fall under 'matchmade' because technically we're being matched with allies but not quite so much with enemies.

Bot games count? I just found out about the skin and I want this in my life, but I haven't play GP since the rework.

Wait, crap, he's off. I CAN'T GET THE SKIN?!?

Can you actually turn Gangplank back on so we can get this free skin? The novelty of him being dead has worn off. You spent all this time and effort reworking him and making this event themed around him, only to disable him for an extended period of time. It's not funny anymore.
He'll be back on with the forthcoming patch.

So if you don't own him already you won't be able to get the skin?

Kinda sad to hear this(I would have already bought him if he weren't free this week xD),but well can't do anything about it.
Yes, you can get him. He will be available in patch 5.15 and if you own him and play him before the end of the event, on August 10th, you will get the free skin.

So if the event ends before the 10th, and we'll have the chance to play gankplank (And get our free sk-I mean because we enjoy the champion >_>) before then, It's safe to assume the patch'll be sometime this week, assuming the 4th or 5th (Patches seem to be on Tuesdays or Wednesdays, if I'm right)?

EDIT: On a more serious note, good job lore team, great event! I'm especially pleased to see that Twisted Fate had such a major focus, considering he was my first champion, and practically the reason I started the game (Saw him in the Twist of Fate cinematic, I'm a sucker for card themes, and he happened to be on the free rotation that week, so I decided to start playing). Almost feels like something's come full circle to see my first champion take part in an event.

Ah I thought the patch would come on august 10th

Thats really awesome,cause I really enjoyed GPs new look :)

Thanks for the info,thats really awesome

I have a question; so one of GP's upgrades on his ult is called "Death's Daughter", which is also the cannon he strapped to Graves/TF during the story. Does this mean he fished up his old cannon after he went for a swim?
Yes they will do it, read close. (If you play a game or if you already played, how can play if is not in?)
This is just......I'm going to need a minute to absorb everything.
About time we got a guy who was neither 6-pack abs nor an outright joke. GP's lookin' good!
Honestly this whole mess still leaves an incredibly bad taste in my mouth. Essentially free skin or no.
